rust.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: the reddish-brown substance that forms on iron or steel when it gets wet
rust.translation[0].definitions[0].examp: There were large patches of rust on the car.
rust.translation[0].definitions[1].defin: a plant disease that causes reddish-brown spots
rust.translation[1].definitions[0].defin: to become covered with rust, or to make something become covered in rust
rust.translation[1].definitions[0].examp: The metal had begun to rust.
The gate was old and badly rusted.
